text: I mean, we're in fall.

text: So basically between now and September 15th, anybody that signs up to have a system installation, that goes for gas heat.

text: Okay, if you sign up by September 15th to have this installed in October or November, there's really deep discounts on these.

text: Because, frankly, we're just trying to fill that calendar, and we try to do that to just make sure all our people stay really busy.

text: So, inventory left over from the summer.

text: You tell them you're interested in what we call the fill-the-calendar special.

speaker: SPEAKER_07

text: The other thing that goes with that is, and this is just a side note on that, if you'll remember, in October, around mid-October to around mid-November, for every system we sell, we give a turkey to the Food Bank of Delaware.

text: And we've been doing this forever.

text: So if you buy a system and sign up for one in October and November, you're going to be contributing significantly.

text: Sure.

text: So you've got to do this by September 15th if you want to get the discounted rate.
